tests.name: Budget Module calculateSavingsRate should calculate savings rate correctly
Budget Module calculateSavingsRate should handle zero savings (income = expenses)
Budget Module calculateSavingsRate should handle zero expenses (100% savings)
Budget Module calculateSavingsRate should handle negative savings (expenses > income)
Budget Module calculateSavingsRate should throw error for zero income
Budget Module calculateSavingsRate should throw error for negative income
Budget Module calculateSavingsRate should throw error for negative expenses
Budget Module analyzeExpenses should analyze expenses correctly
Budget Module analyzeExpenses should handle empty expenses array
Budget Module analyzeExpenses should throw error for invalid input
Budget Module analyzeExpenses should ignore negative expense amounts
Budget Module analyzeExpenses should include zero amount expenses
Budget Module analyzeExpenses should break ties by picking the first category
Budget Module calculateEmergencyFund should calculate emergency fund
Budget Module calculateDebtToIncomeRatio should calculate DTI
Budget Module calculateDebtToIncomeRatio should handle zero debt
Budget Module forecastBudget should forecast future budget
Credit Card Module calculatePayoffTime should calculate payoff time correctly
Credit Card Module calculatePayoffTime should throw error if payment too low
Credit Card Module calculatePayoffTime should return 0 for zero or negative balance
Credit Card Module calculatePayoffTime should throw error for invalid inputs
Credit Card Module calculatePayoffTime should throw "Invalid input parameters" specifically for zero payment
Credit Card Module calculateInterestCharges should calculate interest charges
Credit Card Module calculateMinimumPayment should calculate minimum payment
Credit Card Module calculateMinimumPayment should use floor if payment is low
Credit Card Module compareCards should compare cards correctly
